conbody.p: Contact information, including e-mail and alternate phone number of operator’s employees are collected and stored in NCC SM database and SM logs. The purpose of taking this information is for password recovery. This information, when stored in NCC database and logs, is secured from unauthorized access by restricting access to only individuals with authorized access rights. The data is not de-identified during storage and runtime.

E-mail and alternate phone number are collected as these are the identifiers of an operator’s employee in the NCC system. E-mail and alternate phone number are retained in the database and need to be kept as long as operator account is active and can be removed by operator when account is removed. SM Logs containing the contact information has a configurable duration. Contact information is not logged by default and logging of SM logs can be enabled with specific loggers. SM logs have the configuration duration.
